name: Sentiyen
headline: Conversational AI assistants using your knowledge
description: At Sentiyen, we build GPT-based AI assistants that are trained on your content and enable your audience to get the answers they need 24 hours a day. We allow creators and businesses scale themselves to unlimited 1:1 conversations with potential customers, which helps increase revenue, reduce spend, and improve customer satisfaction.

founders.name: Alex Perelman, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO at Sentiyen. 
Previously Co-Founder and CTO at PeerStreet. 

Writing at alexperelman.com

founders.name: Nathan Shinder, Founder
founders.description: Most recently as a Strategic Operations Manager at PeerStreet I launched a new loan product (long-term rental loans) and scaled the business line to north of $40MM/month.

generated_description:
### Sentiyen: A Quick Overview

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the prestigious Y Combinator Batch S21, Sentiyen is a San Francisco-based company on a mission to revolutionize customer interaction through conversational AI. With a tiny yet potent team of two, the startup has crafted a unique offering: GPT-based AI assistants tailored specifically to your content. This means businesses and creators can engage with their audiences 24/7, fielding inquiries with ease and effectiveness.

The crux of Sentiyen's value proposition lies in scaling conversations. Imagine having unlimited one-on-one dialogues with potential customers without the overhead of hiring a whole support staff. This not only optimizes revenue but also slashes unnecessary costs while boosting customer satisfaction — a triple punch that’s hard to ignore.

Their playful but straightforward tagline captures this essence: "Conversational AI assistants using your knowledge." Sentiyen aims to equip businesses with tools that make customer service both efficient and effortless.

### Current Offerings

Currently, Sentiyen is inviting users to join a waitlist to get updates and express their interest in the service. They have a clear call to action on their website, urging potential clients to fill out a form to expedite their engagement.

### Tags and Tech

Sentiyen is part of a growing trend in AI-enhanced learning and artificial intelligence. The tags associated with them—such as 'ai-assistant' and 'san-francisco-bay-area'—reflect their position in the bustling tech ecosystem of Silicon Valley.

In a world where customer expectations are rising, Sentiyen aims to partner with businesses to meet those needs head-on. If you’re curious about what they offer, you can find more details on their website: [Sentiyen.com](https://www.sentiyen.com).

To summarize, if you’re a business looking to innovate your customer interactions and operate around the clock without breaking the bank, Sentiyen might just be the spark you need.
